description: Bhavantar Bharpai Yojana in Haryana compensates farmers for the price difference between the Minimum Support Price (MSP) and market price for specified crops.
key_features: Compensation for price shortfall below MSP
Covers horticultural crops like tomato, onion, and potato
Direct Benefit Transfer to farmers’ accounts

benefits.compensation: Difference between MSP and market price

criteria: Farmers registered on Meri Fasal Mera Byora portal
Growers of notified crops in Haryana

steps: Register on Meri Fasal Mera Byora portal
Submit crop details and bank account information

special_notes: Covers seasonal crops with volatile prices
